name: Phelisha
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: May I live to always be with you! ;)
text1: It's your birthday!!! You are turning +1 and its magical.
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Leo ni siku yako, jibambe tena sana ...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
